Trade/Device Name(s): Assure Platinum Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Assure Platinum Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Assure Platinum Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood for diabetes management.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip for home (OTC) or clinical use to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
